name: sigbench
description: Test your binary files against signature scans.
author: Konstantin 'cpz' L.

inputs.name: sigSize
inputs.label: Signature Sizes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Signature Sizes (default: 32 or 34, because this length used by Battleye)

inputs.name: file1
inputs.label: File 1 to Compare
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type path to file 1 to compare

inputs.name: file2
inputs.label: File 2 to Compare
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type path to file 2 to compare

inputs.name: customVar
inputs.label: Create Variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Creates variable $(Sigbench.DiffPercent) and $(Sigbench.InterPercent) which provides information about difference and intersection percentage. Example: 99.68362902369064 (difference) or 0.21652039927647887 (intersection).

inputs.name: printMatched
inputs.label: Print Matched Signatures
inputs.helpMarkDown: Prints signatures that matched both binaries.
